short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The vanguard of email security, merging blockchain's might with seamless encryption to shield your digital dialogue.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SealSend – Secure Email Encryption Made Simple

SealSend is a cutting-edge Chrome plugin that brings unparalleled email encryption to your inbox, ensuring your messages are private, secure, and accessible only to the intended recipient.

Features:
- End-to-End Encryption: Your messages are encrypted locally on your device and can only be decrypted by the recipient with their private key.

- Blockchain-Powered Security: Leveraging blockchain technology, SealSend ensures transparency and trust without relying on centralized servers.

- Seamless Integration: Works directly with popular email providers like Gmail, adding a “Secure Compose” button for easy encryption.

- Recipient-Friendly: Recipients can decrypt emails securely using the SealSend plugin and their blockchain wallet.

Why Choose SealSend?
Unlike traditional email services, SealSend ensures your messages never leave your device unencrypted, guaranteeing absolute privacy and security.

Perfect for:
- Individuals who value privacy in their personal communications.
- Businesses needing secure email solutions to protect sensitive data.

Get started with SealSend today and experience the future of secure email communication!

Privacy & Transparency:
SealSend prioritizes your privacy. No unencrypted data is ever transmitted or stored on external servers.
